html:
Junior Collaborative Games Development

Students will work in a junior role in a group comprised of students from across the suite of games development courses to mimic a games development studio. They will work with other juniors and level 6 students who take the role of seniors, to make a vertical slice of a game

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Work effectively as an individual within a project team to produce a game.

+  Reflect on their own personal skills and attributes valuable to a team.

+  Consider a range of established techniques and select an appropriate approach to provide solutions to problems.

+  Communicate within a team as junior members towards a common goal.

Module Content:
